column5: The Tree House is a private garage apartment located in the historic district of downtown Conroe. The apartment is quaint and efficient. Includes parking, private entrance and is within walking distance of local downtown restaurants, shopping and entertainment.  The property is located 5 min off of I-45. Lake Conroe, The Woodlands Waterway, the Cynthia Woods-Mitchell Pavilion and the Lone Star Executive Airport are only minutes away.  This property is protected by video security surveillance.
